#### **Bio**

I am interested in gene regulation, lncRNAs, autoimmune disease, evolution and bioinformatics.

Founding member of VieRnes de Bioinformatica en el LIIGH (bioinformatics fridays at \@[LIIGH-UNAM](https://twitter.com/LIIGH_UNAM)) \| web page: <https://viernesbioinformatica.github.io/>\| Github: [ViernesBioinfo2024](https://github.com/EveliaCoss/ViernesBioinfo2024) and [ViernesBioinfo2023](https://github.com/EveliaCoss/ViernesBioinfo2023)
